chart_description: This chart provides information on the CPU utilization of Netdata workers used for machine learning detection. The chart displays the percentage of CPU usage and represents the overall load on worker nodes. The higher the percentage, the more loaded the system is.

dimension_descriptions.average: The average dimension shows the overall average CPU utilization of the workers over the selected time range. This can be useful for determining the general load on the workers and identifying periods of high utilization.
